parameters.Change: Change in price from previous day

description:
Description
Daily prices and trading volume of Apple stock from July 21st to August 21st in 2016
title: Daily Price and Volume of Apple Stock
usage: A data frame with 66 observations on the following 4 variables.
reference: Closing price of Apple stock (AAPL) for each trading day in a three month period from 7/21/2016 to 10/21/2016 as well as the change in stock price and number of shares traded.
